name: glitch-web-app
description: Template web app for deployment on glitch.com

scripts.start_flask: python3 -m pip install -qqq pip -U . && python3 -m glitch_web_app
scripts.start_fastapi: python3 -m pip install -qqq pip -U . && gunicorn glitch_web_app.fastapi_server:app
scripts.start: python3 -m pip install -qqq pip -U . && gunicorn glitch_web_app.fastapi_server:app
